channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 在塞内加尔 2 月推迟的总统选举中获准参选的 20 名候选人中，有 15 人呼吁最迟于 4 月 2 日举行新的投票。
item.description:
Fifteen of the 20 candidates who were approved to stand in Senegal's delayed February presidential poll have called for the new vote to be held no later than April 2.
tinyurl.com/4wv85e2u

item.title: R to @AFP：#军方消息人士告诉法新社，缅甸军政府已判处三名准将死刑，他们上个月率领数百名士兵投降，并将中国边境的一个战略重镇交给了少数民族战士。
item.description:
#UPDATE Myanmar's junta has sentenced to death three brigadier generals who surrendered with hundreds of troops and handed over a strategic town on the Chinese border to ethnic minority fighters last month, military sources told AFP.
tinyurl.com/26kysv6t

item.title: R to @AFP：#阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀周一说，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京杀害了她的丈夫，她发誓要继承他的事业。
item.description:
#UPDATE Alexei Navalny's widow said Monday that Russian President Vladimir Putin killed her husband, as she vowed to carry on his work, three days after he died in an Arctic prison.
tinyurl.com/yw2mtdsx

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：阿富汗灾害管理部发言人周一表示，在阿富汗东部的努里斯坦省，一场大雪引发的山体滑坡已造成 25 人死亡，8 人受伤。
item.description:
#UPDATE A landslide caused by heavy snowfall has killed 25 people and injured eight others in the eastern Afghan province of Nuristan, a disaster management ministry spokesman said on Monday.
tinyurl.com/3vma7z7k

item.title: 视频：泰国前总理他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）在结束长达 15 年的自我流放生涯后戏剧性地返回泰国，被捕仅六个月后就从警察医院返回曼谷家中。
item.description: VIDEO: The former Thai prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra arrives back at his Bangkok home from a police hospital just six months after he was arrested following a dramatic return to the kingdom from 15 years of self-imposed exile.

item.title: #BREAKING Von der Leyen seeks second term as European Commission chief： party
item.description: #BREAKING Von der Leyen seeks second term as European Commission chief: party

item.title: 一名美国男子被指控去年在巴伐利亚著名的新天鹅堡附近强奸并杀害了一名美国游客，他在周一受审的第一天做出了内容广泛的供认。
item.description:
An American man accused of raping and killing a fellow US tourist near Bavaria's famed Neuschwanstein castle last year made a wide-ranging confession on the first day of his trial Monday.
tinyurl.com/njc62zzz

item.title: 视频：一场山体滑坡将成吨的岩石和泥土冲入大海，加利福尼亚州达纳角崖顶上价值数百万美元的房屋变得更加岌岌可危。
item.description: VIDEO: Multi-million-dollar homes crouched on a clifftop in California's Dana Point got a little bit closer to the edge when a landslide brought tons of rock and soil crashing into the sea.

item.title: R to @AFP：#BREAKING Navalny's widow says 'Putin killed my husband' （纳瓦尔尼遗孀称 "普京杀害了我丈夫
item.description: #BREAKING Navalny's widow says 'Putin killed my husband'

item.title: 法国财政部一位官员周一表示，法国很可能在2023年超额完成预算赤字目标。
item.description:
France likely overshot its budget deficit target in 2023, a finance ministry official said on Monday.
tinyurl.com/2scd4b5c

item.title: 视频：海洋生物学家在南极洲采集座头鲸和豹斑海豹的皮肤样本，以检测它们体内是否含有汞。
item.description: VIDEO: Marine biologists collect skin samples from humpback whales and leopard seals in Antarctica to detect the presence of mercury in their bodies.

item.title: 工会告诉法新社，世界顶级旅游景点之一的埃菲尔铁塔在工作人员罢工后于周一关闭。
item.description:
The Eiffel Tower, one of the world's top tourist attractions, was closed Monday after staff went on strike, unions told AFP.
u.afp.com/5Ndw

item.title: 视频：数百名裸体男子为争夺一袋木制护身符而大打出手，为日本一个有着千年历史的仪式画上了最后一个戏剧性的句号。相扑 "节受到日本人口老龄化危机的影响。
item.description: VIDEO: Hundreds of naked men tussle over a bag of wooden talismans, performing a dramatic end to a thousand-year-old ritual in Japan that took place for the last time. The "Sominsai" festival is impacted by the country's ageing population crisis.

item.title: R to @AFP：#在已故俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀准备会见欧洲外长之际，他的团队周一表示，他的母亲已是第三天被拒绝接触他的遗体。
item.description:
#UPDATE The mother of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny is being refused access to his body for a third day, his team said on Monday as his widow prepared to meet European foreign ministers.
u.afp.com/5Ndo

item.title: 视频：饭团 "用紫菜包着，里面塞满了美味的馅料，摆脱了在日本廉价、无趣小吃的名声，吸引着国外饥饿的皈依者。
item.description: VIDEO: Wrapped in seaweed and stuffed with delicious fillings, "onigiri" rice balls are shaking off their reputation as a cheap and uninspiring snack in Japan, and enticing hungry converts abroad.

item.title:
R to @AFP：#警方称，在巴布亚新几内亚高地发现了数十具血淋淋的尸体，这是交战部族之间长期暴力活动的升级，令人毛骨悚然。
警方称，多达 64 名部落战士在敌对组织的伏击中丧生。
item.description:
#UPDATE Dozens of bloodied bodies have been found in Papua New Guinea's highlands, police say, a gruesome escalation of long-running violence between warring clans.

Police say as many as 64 tribal fighters were killed in an ambush by a rival group

u.afp.com/5NAH

item.title: 周一，14 人在香港受审，他们涉嫌计划在 2019 年民主抗议活动期间实施炸弹袭击，谋杀警察。
item.description:
Fourteen people went on trial Monday in Hong Kong for allegedly planning to carry out a bomb attack to murder police officers during pro-democracy protests in 2019, with prosecutors invoking the city's anti-terrorism act

u.afp.com/5NAB

item.title:
日本 "裸男节 "落下帷幕。
由于组织裸男节已成为当地年迈村民的沉重负担，这个有着千年历史的年度仪式今年将最后一次举行。
item.description:
Japan's 'naked men' festival comes to an end.

The thousand-year-old annual ritual was held for the last time this year as organising the festival has become too heavy a burden for the ageing local villagers

u.afp.com/5NAk

item.title: #灾难部：阿富汗大雪引发山体滑坡，25 人丧生
item.description: #BREAKING 25 killed in Afghanistan landslide caused by snow: disaster ministry

item.title: #消息来源：3 名缅甸准将因交出重镇被判处死刑
item.description: #BREAKING 3 Myanmar brigadier generals sentenced to death for surrendering key town: sources

item.title: 在实习医生为抗议医疗培训改革而集体辞职后，韩国周一下令实习医生返回工作岗位，政府正考虑使用军队医务人员来解决短缺问题。
item.description:
South Korea ordered trainee doctors back to work Monday after they resigned en masse to protest medical training reforms, with the government looking at using military medics to cope with shortfalls

u.afp.com/5NAx

item.title:
R to @AFP：#纳瓦尔尼的女发言人周一表示，俄罗斯调查人员已告知已故反对党领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的母亲及其律师，对他在狱中死亡的调查 "已经延期"。
"目前尚不清楚调查将持续多久。死因仍'未确定'。他们在撒谎，在拖延时间，甚至毫不掩饰。
item.description:
#UPDATE Russian investigators have told the mother of late opposition leader Alexei Navalny and his lawyers that the investigation into his death in prison "has been extended", Navalny's spokeswoman said on Monday.

"It is not known how long it will continue. The cause of death is still 'undetermined'. They're lying, playing for time and do not even hide it," the spokeswoman, Kira Yarmysh, said on X

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息 俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的团队周一表示，他的亲属已连续第三天被拒绝探视他的遗体。
俄罗斯监狱部门称，纳瓦尔尼周五在北极监狱散步后死亡。
纳瓦尔尼的母亲柳德米拉（Lyudmila）周六前往这个偏远的监狱，但仍未获准接触儿子的遗体。
item.description:
#UPDATE The relatives of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny have been refused access to his body for a third day, his team said Monday.

Russia's prison service said Navalny died after a walk in his Arctic prison on Friday.

His mother, Lyudmila, travelled to the remote colony on Saturday, but has still not been allowed access to her son's body

item.title: R to @AFP：#BREAKING Navalny team says relatives refused access to his body for third day
item.description: #BREAKING Navalny team says relatives refused access to his body for third day

item.title:
以色列威胁说，如果哈马斯届时不归还剩余人质，以色列将在斋月开始前入侵加沙拉法。
以色列受到国际压力，要求其取消进攻计划并保护在该城避难的平民。
item.description:
Israel has threatened to invade Gaza's Rafah by the start of Ramadan if Hamas does not return the remaining hostages by then.

Israel has come under international pressure to call off its planned offensive and protect civilians sheltering in the city

u.afp.com/5NAf

item.title: 周一，曼尼-帕奎奥承认他的奥运拳击梦想破灭了，因为这位拳坛巨星无缘今年的巴黎奥运会。
item.description:
A "saddened and disappointed" Manny Pacquiao conceded Monday his Olympic boxing dream was over after the ring great was denied a berth at this year's Paris games

u.afp.com/5NAU

item.title: R to @AFP：#巴布亚新几内亚警方誓言 "不惜一切代价 "制止部落暴力
item.description: #BREAKING Papua New Guinea police vow 'any level of force' to halt tribal violence

item.title: 周日，在美国明尼苏达州，两名警察和一名急救人员在接听一起家庭纠纷的报警电话后遭枪击身亡，屋内有多名儿童。
item.description:
Two police officers and a first responder were shot and killed on Sunday in the US state of Minnesota after answering a call about a domestic dispute in a house with multiple children inside

u.afp.com/5NAo

item.title:
R to @AFP：向纳瓦尔尼致敬。
克里姆林宫最著名的批评家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）在俄罗斯北极监狱去世后，@AFP 摄影师报道了世界各地举行的集会、抗议和悼念活动。
item.description:
Tributes to Navalny.

@AFP photographers cover the rallies, protests and memorials held around the world following the death of the Kremlin's most prominent critic Alexei Navalny in an Arctic prison in Russia

item.title:
通配符候选人威胁到美国大选的天平。
自乔治-华盛顿（George Washington）以来，美国人还没有选出过独立的总统，但被两位领跑者拒之门外的公众似乎比以往任何时候都更愿意接受通配符候选人。
item.description:
Wildcard candidates threaten to tip scales in US election.

Americans haven't elected an independent president since George Washington, but a public turned off by the two frontrunners appears more open than ever to wildcards

u.afp.com/5NQt
